About Us  
RaptorNode is miles above the rest as an exceptional hosting company. We have many years of leading experience with global businesses of all sizes and have built up an affluence of hosting expertise that put down us a scratch above other hosting companies in this time. RaptorNode is a company that you can rely on for all of your Hosting needs. With 24 hour support there is no reason not to sign up today!  
  
Why us?  
This are a few of the many reasons why you should choose us  
  
Equipment/Hardware:  
RaptorNode's hardware are privately owns the servers, racks, and all of our networking equipment. All of our services are delivered with guaranteed service levels and around-the-clock support. Our data centers are staffed with our on-site expert engineers and support technicians 24 hours a day, every day of the year. Using the latest equipment and technology we proudly deliver exceptional service, support, and allround hosting solutions.

Technologies:
Customers choose RaptorNode because we provide incredible services at amazing prices. This usually mean less powerful services and features but not with RaptorNode. Our VPS Services are feature packed offering you way more than the competition. Don’t take our word for it, check out our VPS hosting plans and see for yourself!  
  
About our DDoS Mitigation  
All of our VPS include 10Gbps/6000k DDoS protection, Per IP, Meaning oppose to other Hosts where it's overall, We can guarantee 10Gbps/6000k per IP.
